00020 #ifndef INTENSITYMODEL_H_
00021 #define INTENSITYMODEL_H_
00022 
00023 #include <math.h>
00024 
00025 #include "MiXiMDefs.h"
00026 #include "AnalogueModel.h"
00027 #include "Mapping.h"
00028 #include "AirFrame_m.h"
00029 #include "FWMath.h"
00030 
00036 class MIXIM_API IntensityModel : public AnalogueModel {
00037 
00038 public:
00039   IntensityModel() { }
00040   virtual ~IntensityModel() { }
00041   void filterSignal(AirFrame *frame, const Coord& sendersPos, const Coord& receiverPos) {
00042     Signal&              s          = frame->getSignal();
00043     TimeMapping<Linear>* attMapping = new TimeMapping<Linear> ();
00044 
00045     // Determine distance between sender and receiver
00046     assert(s.getReceptionStart() == simTime());
00047     double distance    = sendersPos.distance(receiverPos);
00048 
00049     Argument arg;
00050     attMapping->setValue(arg, 4*M_PI*pow(distance, 2));
00051     s.addAttenuation(attMapping);
00052   }
00053 };
00054 
00055 #endif /* INTENSITYMODEL_H_ */
